posts: Pure pace! Robin Liddell in the #71 Aston Martin set the fastest lap at 1:55.836. Unmatched speed today! 🚀 #IMSA #RacePace #AstonMartin
Dominant performance! BMW leads the manufacturer pace ranking by a significant margin. Their overall optimal lap is a testament to raw speed. 💨 #IMSA #BMW #Motorsport
Unlocked speed? Car #98's Harry Gottsacker (Hyundai) has 0.735s of theoretical time on track. Imagine that optimal lap! 🤯 #IMSA #Hyundai #Analytics
Consistency is key! The Metronome Award goes to Tyler Gonzalez in the #99 Hyundai! Near-perfect lap time consistency with a tiny 0.025s stdev. ⏱️📊 #IMSA #RaceData #Consistency
Ultimate teamwork! Car #13 (McCumbee McAleer Racing, Ford) shows incredible driver harmony with only a 0.014s best lap delta between Jenson Altzman & Chad McCumbee. 💪 #IMSA #Ford #Teamwork
Flawless execution! CarBahn's #4 BMW had the most efficient pit cycle, minimizing time loss in the pits. Strategy wins races! 🏁 #IMSA #PitStop #Strategy
Digging into tire data! Despite strong single lap pace, Mercedes-AMG shows higher tire degradation. A factor to watch for future races. 📈 #IMSA #MercedesAMG #TireWear
